mapper.select: SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, NVL(t.tran_status_code,'0') tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, p.prod_name, p.image_file, p.manufacture_day FROM transaction t, product p WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND tran_no= #{tranNo} ORDER BY tran_no DESC

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT inner_table.* , ROWNUM AS row_seq FROM( SELECT t.tran_no, t.prod_no, t.buyer_id, t.payment_option, t.receiver_name, t.receiver_phone, t.demailaddr, t.dlvy_request, NVL(t.tran_status_code,'0') tran_status_code, t.order_data, t.dlvy_date, p.prod_name, p.image_file, p.manufacture_day FROM transaction t, product p WHERE p.prod_no = t.prod_no(+) AND t.buyer_id = #{buyerId} ORDER BY tran_no DESC ) inner_table WHERE ROWNUM <= #{search.endRowNum} ) WHERE row_seq BETWEEN #{search.startRowNum} AND #{search.endRowNum}

SELECT COUNT(*) FROM( SELECT tran_no, prod_no, buyer_id, payment_option, receiver_name, receiver_phone, demailaddr, dlvy_request, NVL(tran_status_code,'0') tran_status_code, order_data, dlvy_date FROM transaction WHERE buyer_id= #{buyerId} ) countTable
